Detailed Description

This structure defines the parameters required to configure the peaking block.

struct Vps_ScPeakingConfig Peaking block increases the amplitude of high frequency luminance information in horizontal direction to increase the sharpness of a video image before it is scaled. This configuration is for the advanced users and for debugging. Normal applications should not use this structure.

Field Documentation

UInt8 Vps_ScPeakingConfig::hpfCoeff[VPS_SC_PEAKING_MAX_COEFF]

Array of coefficients for 11 tap high pass filter.

UInt8 Vps_ScPeakingConfig::hpfNormShift

HPF value will be right shifted by this value.

UInt16 Vps_ScPeakingConfig::nlClipLimit

Non linear clipping limit.

UInt16 Vps_ScPeakingConfig::nlHighSlopeShift

Shift of the nonlinear peaking function.

UInt16 Vps_ScPeakingConfig::nlHighThreshold

High threshold for nonlinear peaking block.

UInt16 Vps_ScPeakingConfig::nlLowSlopeGain

Slope of the nonlinear peaking function.

UInt16 Vps_ScPeakingConfig::nlLowThreshold

Coring threshold.
